name: Christopher Lindsey
text: Jim is knowledgeable and really funny.  He is focused on the work. My hydraulics come here to be repaired. I wouldn't even consider going any other place.

resp.text: Thank you Chris!

name: Krash Hamilton
text: Great people that are dedicated to perfection.

name: Blake Powers
text: Price  gouging at its best!!!  They had one guy working 5 hours of wo $1900!  On top of that they were supposed to meet us at 8:00 AM on Saturday morning and showed up at 11. It cost us a whole day of work.  Save yourself by not making this mistake !  The job should’ve been $400.  I’m taking this to the better business bureau.

name: Eddie Kiser
text: Great people to have working for you. Sam was an excellent help after hours got us back going quick. No one eles will get my business while working in this area.

resp.text: Thank you.  I will tell Sam of your kind words!

name: Bill Yancy
text: Just excellent service. I left my backhoe's leaking arm cylinder here and JimPam had it ready for me in 2 days, and at a better price for new seals than I've EVER gotten. It works like brand new now, Jim's experience speaks for itself

resp.text: Thank you! I'm glad we were able to get you up and running quickly!

name: Chuck Linderman
text:
They do jobs nobody else can. The Hydraulic manifold on my Russian Belarus 250AS was in need of an overhaul. Every where I took it said trash it, buy another or wouldn't even consider attempting to rebuild it.
Jim was able to do the job for a fair price and saved me a lot of time and money. Check them out !!

resp.text: Thanks Chuck! It was a pleasure meeting you, and thank you for the comment!

name: Robyn Z
text: Excellent, friendly, professional, and very clean shop. And fast services. I won't go anywhere else for my hydraulic services. Thanks Jim your awesome!

resp.text: Wow!  Thanks so much!

name: franklin mitchell
text: Check with Jim before you buy the rebuilt kit from dealer. A friend told me about  Jimpam. Now ill tell all in need of repair where to go. Excellent  experience

resp.text: Thank you! We are usually able to buy parts, seals, etc for less than what our customers could buy the item for.  We pass that savings on to our customers.  Thanks for your review!

name: Mike Smith
text: Totally ruined a hydralic lift unit.Still to this day unable to use! Should have been told but i guess they were more into money than customer.

name: Mike S
text: Best tech in the southeast. If no one else can do it, Jim can!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to say!  We appreciate your business!

name: Ricky R.
text:
Very professional and friendly team.  Quick to respond and flexible. Highly recommend.

J&H Tree service made cutting 50 ft pines, look easy.  Keep up the great work.

name: Kitty Cobb
text: J&H Tree Service came out to my house and removed over 50 oak and pine trees on my property. These guys were very professional and know what they are doing! They have a great work ethic and did my job in a timely manner and I was absolutely pleased with their work! You cannot ask for a better tree service. I HIGHLY recommend them!!! I won't hesitate to use them again.

resp.text: Thank you very much for that review Kitty! That review means so much to me and I love all of my customers! I strive for excellent customer service and professionalism. We work so hard to make sure that our customers are taken care of and give them our best each and every time. We take steps to make sure that we are safe and complete the job 100% without any damage. Thank you again! We look forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: Lisa Bouier
text: This tree service was very professional with their services. The guys were very informative about the job for someone that knows nothing about removing trees off  their property these are the very BEST guys to deal with. They were very nice and knew exactly what they were doing. They informed me of any troubled spots or diseased trees on my property. They took down 3 pines and cleaned out my fence line that also had some trees there. You wouldn’t go wrong with choosing this company to get the job done quickly and efficiently... I am very pleased.

resp.text: Thank you very much Lisa for your review! We take alot of pride in making sure our customers are educated about trees and know when to prune them up and remove them when necessary. We are very grateful for the business and take a lot of pride in professionalism and providing that absolute best service possible for our clients! We hope that you use our services again In the future!

name: Barbaracarol 4
text: I had 4 giant pecan trees removed stumps and all they are reasonably priced started the job quickly , the crew was professional and friendly. I am so pleased with their work. I highly recommend J&H tree service fantastic job guys thank you.

name: Wade Becnel
text: Josh and his professional team did a great job. This was repeat business for me since I hired them several years ago to remove several large trees in my yard and they continue to provide quality support. Strongly recommend them for any job you may have.

resp.text: Thank you very much Wade for your kind review! I'm so thankful that you are a loyal customer and keep using us for your tree service needs. We take alot of pride in that! We provide our customers with top notch quality work and professionalism. Our customers are our # 1 priority! We hope to hear from you again in the future!

name: Justin Burchfield
text: Josh and his crew did a fantastic job for us. He took down 19 trees for us for a very reasonable price and had it all done and cleaned up in 3 days. I recommend doing business with them!

resp.text: Thank you Justin for your review! It was a pleasure taking those trees out for you. There is no job to big or to small and we always do our jobs in a timely manner with top notch quality work! We appreciate your business and we hope to do more business with you again in the future!

name: Tyler Collins
text: Highly recommend! We have used J&H Tree Service on multiple occasions and have never been disappointed. Josh and his crew are always on time, professional, and get the job done right no matter the size. They go above and beyond and they are our go-to tree service!

resp.text: Thank you so much for that awesome review Tyler. We are very thankful that you continue to use us for all of your tree service needs. We take alot of pride in making sure that we go above and beyond for our clients and take care of them to the highest standard possible! Professionalism is very high on our priority list. We hope to provide services for you again in the near future!

name: Amber Traylor
text: I can not say enough good words about Josh and his team. They removed a huge brush pile from our back yard along with several trees. They even went above and beyond by doing more than we expected. If you want someone trustworthy that knows what they are doing go with J&H!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amber for that review! I'm so glad that we were able to help you and it's always nice hearing those kind words from our customers. We always go above and beyond for all of our clients! Let us know when you need some more work done and we will be happy to provide you with our services again!

name: Tyler Campbell
text: Did a great job cutting down two dead trees I had in my yard. Worked with me to minimize damage on my yard with moving the equipment in and out. Did the job very quickly and left it in a clean state. Good follow through on answering calls and texts as we planned out the work.

resp.text: Thank you Tyler for your review! We take our profession very serious and communication is very important to me. I'm glad that you decided to use our services and very thankful for the work! We treat our customers homes as if we were living there so we make sure to leave our customers homes in top notch shape when our services are completed. We look forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: Aj Ja
text: I highly recommend J&H Tree Service. I received a free quote on Monday (was happy with quote) and on Tuesday J&H was at my home removing limbs and a tree from my yard. They were all very professional and friendly. I will definitely be using J&H Tree Service in the future!!

name: Ben Roedl
text: Did an amazing job. Would use again.

name: Amanda Emerson
text: Would definitely not recommend.  Not reliable at all. They did a good job cutting down a few trees but they left  huge piles all over our property.   When I call about making this better he just says someone is going to come back out but they never do. Save your money and use another company

resp.text: We apologize for any inconvenience. We hope that we can fix this issue for you. We always want our customers to be very satisfied. We take alot of pride in our clean up and that Is one thing our customers love about us.

name: Teresa Kelley
text: Josh came to give a quote the same day that I called for one. He and his crew showed up early the NEXT morning and  the job was completed that day. Which made me very happy. And it was not a small job!! I highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you Teresa for your review and glad that you are happy with our services. We pride ourselves on being prompt, on-time, & work efficiently to get the job done! I am very grateful for the business and hope that you use our services again in the future!

name: robin yelverton
text: Josh and his crew did a great job taking down trees at my family’s property. We had a little communication issue at the beginning but once we got that straight, all my issues were taken care of promptly. I would call Josh again if I needed some trees down.

resp.text: Thank you Robin for that review and choosing us to do your work! I apologize for the lack of communication in the beginning and happy that we have another satisfied customer! We have a high volume of text, e-mail & phone calls everyday and we try to stay up to date with all of our customers. We hope that you use our services again in the future!

name: Gail Clements
text: They came and cut down two large trees.  One was cut up and removed.  The other was left and Josh said they would come back and remove it.  He was paid for both trees and the contract included removal.  After almost two months with no response, Dixie Tree Service removed the tree.  I would not ever recommend J&H or ever use them again.

name: John Griffin
text: We hired Josh in May, 2020 to remove 6 trees and grind the stumps. He came out to our home on a Friday to do the job, cut down three trees, and called us to see if we would be willing to meet him with payment, saying, "we are going to stay out here until the job is done." He cashed our check THAT DAY and never came back. We tried for months to get him to come back out, but he always had some excuse and would not return our money. We are in the process of suing him to retrieve our funds. DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE WE MADE.

name: Theresa Long
text: One of our largest trees got uprooted during the hurricane.  The tree was leaning over our pool and home posing a real hazard.  J & H tree service came out gave us a quote, showed up when they said they would, did an amazing, professional job safely! What impressed us the most was the attention to detail they showed in ensuring our belongs and home were not damaged and the property was left very clean!! Well worth the money- they have my highest recommendation!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for that awesome review! I am so honored to get that review and we take our profession very serious. We look at every angle before starting a project and make sure we explain everything to the customer before performing the services rendered. Safety & professionalism is very big with us and we always pay attention to detail. I'm looking forward to doing more business with you in the future!

name: Kimberle Lindsey
text: The company did a great job for us removing two stumps in our back yard!

resp.text: Thank you Kimberle for the review! We always make sure we grind our stumps 6-8" below grade and clean up all of the wood chips. We hope you use us again in the future!

name: Matt Jennings
text: I needed someone to assess hurricane wind damage to my residential lot, give me a quote, and then do the work necessary to remove multiple fallen trees and restore things to good shape, as my lot is on the market for sale. They responded promptly and handled the job efficiently and professionally with appropriate communication throughout. I live over 3 hours away, so it was good to have eyes on my property. It saved me a day of time, and it was good to know things were in good hands. Don’t hesitate to hire these guys, I’m glad I did and couldn’t be more satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you so much Matt for the review! We pride ourselves on professionalism and communication! We take pride in our work and make every effort to make sure our customers are satisfied! We are very thankful for your business! Looking forward to doing more business with you again in the future!

name: Jeanetta Irvin
text: J & H Tree Service did an excellent job removing a number of large  oak limbs over our house and taking down a huge pine in front. They took care to move things that might be damaged and then replaced everything before leaving. They cleaned up completely even skimming the few leaves that fell in the pool We were very satisfied with Josh and his whole crew. All were very friendly and concerned with customer satisfaction.

resp.text: Thank you Jeanetta for your review and I'm very thankful for the business! We treat our customers like family and I strive for 100% customer satisfaction from beginning to the end of the job! Our customers are very important to us and we take great pride in our work and go above and beyond for our customers! We look forward in doing business with you again in the future! God Bless!

name: Leigh Mobley
text: I am very pleased with the work they did in my yard. They are Very professional. I was so impressed they arrived on time, got the job done and cleaned up. The job of removing two trees and raising the canopy of the whole yard was very well done. I highly recommend Josh and his crew.

resp.text: Thank you Leigh for the review! We are very thankful for the business and glad that your satisfied with our services! We take our profession very serious and strive for excellent customer service and going above and beyond for our customers! I'm looking forward to doing more business with you again in the future!

name: David Clark
text: These  men did a wonderful job at my house today. Mr. Josh, Matthew, Mike, Robert, and Mark were very enjoyable to meet and talk to and they did a professional job in my yard today. My wife was extremely happy with the work as was I.  They are fine young men and I strongly encourage anybody that needs tree service to use them. They even stayed and sharpened my own chainsaw without being asked to. Again I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you very much Mr. Clark for that review! We pride ourselves on professionalism and excellent customer service! We are very thankful for the business and glad that you were very satisfied with our services! We are looking forward to doing business with you again in the future.

name: Mary Davison
text: I would highly recommend this company to anyone. After hurricane Michael we had some trees come down and we called J&h. They were very professional and responded right away. Great job and a hard working group of guys. It’s literally 5:30pm on Sunday and they are still at it. I recommended them to my neighbor and they are now working on their property. They will be at it until late tonight. You gotta respect that.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mary for your review! I have alot of pride in my team and we work until the job is done! We are very dedicated to our job and strive for great customer service! We are looking forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: PEARL EASTER-WILSON
text: J & H is a very customer oriented, professional and safety focused business.  The company specializes in large tree removal, storm damage removal, clearing property and crane services but also does other services such a laying cement, demolition and lawn care and restoration. The team is highly trained and skilled in operating heavy equipment such as cranes in open and fenced in areas.    They removed trees in my yard that were almost six feet in diameter, very tall and full without any disturbances to adjoining properties or fences.  Prices are very reasonable for the quality of work provided.  Their work ethics are impeccable; they were on time each day, courteous and never left a messy area.  All tree stumps were completely grind down and all debris removed.  I highly recommend this company.

resp.text: I am absolutely honored to get such a great review such as this one! It makes me feel very good knowing that I am gaining another completely satisfied customer! Thank you Pearl Wilson for your business! J&H Tree Service prides ourselves on superior work ethics and safety is our #1 goal on every job. We specialize in dangerous tree Removal such as the job we just done for you and glad it was a 100% success! Can't wait to do some more work for you again in the future!

name: Zachary Marden
text: I had a large branch break halfway through and fall on my roof in the late afternoon. Called these gentlemen, and they were there within an hour. They cut that branch down right at dusk, showed me why the tree was dying and needed to come down, and then cut me a deal on that tree and two other problem trees. They knocked it all out the next day before a large storm came through and knocked other limbs down in my neighborhood.  I couldn't recommend these guys enough!

resp.text: Thank you Zachary for leaving a review for our business! We are a 24 hour tree service and will respond to any call day or night. We go above and beyond for our customers and ensure the highest level of professionalism when it comes to trees and when they need to be removed and pruned. We are happy that we were able to provide our services to you and look forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: Judy Stewart
text: J&H Tree Service cut down one very tall oak tree and a small one. Their price was good  and  they were on time.  Very hard working, polite crew. They did a GREAT job. They took care of the stumps and cleaned up all of the debris I definitely would use them again and would recommend them to anyone needing tree service.

resp.text: Thank you so much Judy for the fantastic review! We want our customers to have a great experience with us and pride ourselves on professionalism and 100% customer satisfaction! Very happy to earn your business again in the future!

name: Ana Bickford
text: Kudos to J&H tree services. Absolutely great job! Very professional and customer-oriented with reasonable prices. J&H tree services owner and staff went over and beyond to accommodate my needs, very courteous, knowledgeable, and professional at all times. I would highly recommend two friends and neighbors.

resp.text: Thank you Ana for your review! We are thrilled that you are happy with our services! We are looking forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: Jamie Goodman
text: Great company to use for tree removal.  J & H helped us the morning after hurricane Michael with a fallen tree that was at risk of hitting our house.   We called J and H again to remove 2 trees in our front yard, and trim limbs the back yard so our grass would grow.  Josh is very professional.  He keeps his word, does great work, and does not leave any limbs or leaves behind.  We will use J and H anytime we need to remove or trim trees in our yard.

resp.text: Thank you very much Jamie for your review and your loyalty to J&H Tree Service. We are very greatful for the business and we treat our customers homes as if they were ours! We are very meticulous about our clean up and go above and beyond for our customers! We pride ourselves on professionalism and provide excellent customer service! We want a great experience for our customers! Thank you again for the continued business and we look forward to doing business again with you in the future!

name: Andrew Bath
text: Josh at J&H Tree Service was great to work with! Once he and his team started they had the trees removed that were a danger to our building in no time! We greatly appreciate their hard work, quality, and service!

resp.text: Thank you Andrew for your kind review! We specialize in dangerous tree removal and very happy we were able to provide you with our services with 100% complete removal with no damage. We do our very best to provide our customers with top notch quality service. We hope that you use our services again in the future!

name: Chris B
text: Highly recommended. I've used three different companies for tree services since I've moved to Dothan in the last 1.5 years. J&H is the only one I would recommend, which is why I have used them three different times already and will again in the future. They provide high quality work and great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so much Chris for great review! I am very thankful that you continue to keep using J&H Tree Service. We love all of our customers and we take great pride in professionalism and giving our customers 100% customer satisfaction and leaving them with a great work experience. We go above and beyond for our customers and try to help out anyway we can. Our customers are #1 and we will continue to go by that standard! We want to thank you again for the business and look forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: Robert Allen
text:
I arranged for J&H to do some pruning and tree removal in my Mom's yard in Dothan. I set up the original appointment via e-mail. I live 5 time zones away and coordinated the work for the week I was at my Mom's. Josh came by, gave me an estimate, and recommended removal of two trees. Both were close to the house, one was a 50-ft oak tree.  Josh was able to reschedule a day earlier than he originally projected.

About 6 hours of work, and the tree felling operations went flawlessly dropping right between house and fence. The crew was professional, Josh was personally meticulous about cleaning and power blowing yard clean, especially around pool. Josh owns and runs this business and of course will be saturated with calls after severe weather events.  That's why I elected to have the work done on my schedule, not Mother Nature's. I had some questions after the work was completed and Josh provided timely responses and follow up to my questions. I'd hire him again.

resp.text: Thanks Robert we really appreciate the review.

name: Rick McCleskey
text:
My first impression and review was only one star since they failed to show up or call with a reason for not showing up to give an estimate on tree removal,,,not once, but twice.
EDIT:  Several days later, they called, made an appointment for an estimate and showed up on time.  Their price quote was fair and less than others I had received so they were hired.
Due to weather and additional trees downed, what was supposed to be a 3 day job  has turned into 5 .   J &H has been great.. They've had as many as 10 to.12 workers here at one time and ALL were very polite and hard working. I'm impressed with the personnel and equipment they have.
I can honestly say,  I'm happy with their work and I'm very picky.  Josh and his personnel are the best and you won't be disappointed if you hire them.. Just be patient if can't get in touch with them right away.

Called them a second time and the prices were now out of sight.

resp.text: Thank you Rick for giving us the opportunity to work for you! We are very thankful and glad that you are satisfied! We take pride on professionalism and great customer service! We are looking forward to doing more business with you again in the future!

name: Carl Pylant
text: Josh and his crew were prompt, courteous and efficient. They provided a great service for a fair price. If you need a tree trimming/removal service, give these guys a call.

resp.text: Thank you Carl for your review! We have very competitive prices and believe in taking care of our customers! A professional company should be on time and provide 100% communication to the customer as we do just that. We are greatful for the business and looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: Amanda Pierson
text: These guys did a wonderful job moving a big tree that had fallen during the last hurricane. They also took down another tree for us and grinded down a couple stumps. They work fast and get it done! We are very pleased with their work and will definitely use them again and recommend to others.

resp.text: Thank you Amanda for your review and very thankful for the business. We are happy that your satisfied with our services and looking forward to doing more business with you again in the future!

name: Kim Smith
text: We had J & H Tree services trim our oak trees and we were left speechless. Mr. Josh has an amazing team and watching them work together you can tell he has great leadership. He did as much of the work as his team did. We both really like that he is hands on. We would very much so recommend his company to others. We like that he kept us in the loop from start to finish. When they were done it was like no one had even been here. Our yard looks so BIG and BRIGHT. We love it! Its like a new property. Keep up the great work guys.

resp.text: Wow great review thanks Kim. We aim to please.

name: Kyle Harper
text: Did great work for a fair price. Worked great with my wife and I schedules and kept a good line of communication with us through out the process. They hold themselves to professional standards and the results reflect that. Definitely would recommend

resp.text: Thank you kyle for your review! We take professionalism very seriously and believe communication is the key to a strong and successful business! I take great pride in making sure my customers are very happy and glad that I have earned another customer! Thanks so much!

name: Bill
text: Absolutely outstanding service, in a tight close quarters space. I would recommend this company to anyone I know without hesitation. Many thanks Josh, my wife is a happy camper now.

resp.text: Thank you so much Bill for your review! I'm very thankful that I could provide my services to you as well as excellent customer service. We treat our customers like family and take our profession very serious. We specialize in tight spaces and dangerous tree removal! Thanks for the recommendation, It really means alot.

name: Janice Arango
text: Josh responded promptly to my request for an estimate and kept me informed about when the scheduled work would be performed.   He and his crew did a great job removing about 50 trees from my property, and trimming up several others.  They totally cleaned up and removed the mess.  The price was extremely reasonable.  I would use this company again for tree work and would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Janice thanks for the great review. We really appreciate your business.

name: Roger Day
text: The team was very good at their job. And courteous. My 3 year old granddaughter was thrilled by the show they provided in bring down the trees. I will recommend them to anyone looking for tree service.

resp.text: Thank you roger for the review! Thank you for the business and happy that you will use us in the future!

name: William O'Brien
text: We hired them to remove 15 trees from our backyard. We could not be more pleased with the work they done! Josh and his crew are very professional and prompt. Also, the prices can't be beat! We will definitely call them for any tree needs in the future!

resp.text: William thank you so much for the great review.

name: Sydney Hardy
text: Won’t be using anyone else again! Josh and his team did a wonderful job. Thanks again!

resp.text: Thank you Sydney for your review! We are very greatful for the business and looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: cindy grommes
text: Josh and his crew did excellent work. Professional and courteous. Trees were removed that were too close to home. Work was clean. I definitely recommend Josh and his team.!!

resp.text: Thank you cindy for the review! We specialize in dangerous tree removal and trees that are close to the home. We are happy you called us to do your trees & looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: Jeremy Kilpatrick
text: Hands down the best company to use to have trees dropped, limbed, and stumps removed. They coordinated with Alabama Power to have my power lines removed to keep from having any issues with limbs or anything falling on them during the tree removal (which was a huge tree with the limbs laying across my roof) and even with my older kids at home they were never bothered, an once I got home from work the gentleman was nice enough to swing by for payment and even gave me a discount due to my neighbor utilizing them to remove trees off his property. The area where my tree was at was all cleaned off like it never had one even there. The guys are A++++ and id recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much Jeremy for that great review! I am honored! I am so happy that you are very pleased with our work and we give 150% to our customers everytime we do a job! I am so proud of my team for everything that they do for me and for being able to provide such great customer service experience! J&H Tree Service feels like we are the best because we put so much hard work and dedication into this company. We treat our cutsomers homes as if we were living there and thats what we stand by in our company! Thank you so much for your business and we are looking forward to doing more work for you in the future!

name: Amelia Whitaker
text: Great company and great work!!!  I was impressed with how quickly they worked taking down our 9 HUGE trees.  They were easy to work with, and kept in contact during the duration of the job.  KUDOS to J & H Tree Service for such great experience!

resp.text: Thank you so much Amelia for your review! I'm glad you chose J&H Tree Serivce, LLC. for your tree service needs. We strive ourselves on professionalism and great customer service experience.

name: Southpaw Gamez
text: Josh and his crew are professional and efficient. Josh was very accommodating to our schedule. They left the yard clean and looking great. We will continue to use J&H in the future. Thank you Josh!

resp.text: Thank you emily for the review & your very welcome! We are very thorough about our work & we want our customers yard to look just as good if not better when we leave! We treat our customers home as if it was our home. Im very happy to gain a new customer and I am looking forward to doing business again with you in the future!

name: Jennifer Hill
text: Very professional, great communication. This company goes above and beyond to take care of their customers and make sure the job is done right. If you need tree work this is the company to call!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review jennifer! We love our customers and we will go above and beyond to please them! We strive for excellence and professionalism as well as communication.

name: Allison Sims
text: I was very pleased with the removal of some difficult trees and debris.  I thought the price was great, as well as the work. I will definitely use them for future work and would also recommend their work!

resp.text: Thank you very much allison for that kind review! We specialize in working in tight areas and dangerous tree removal. We look forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: Cheryl Mixson
text: Very pleased with the job they did.   Cut two  very large trees and trimmed several others.   Josh and his team were very conscientious and a pleasure to work with.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! I'm glad that you were very pleased with our work and hope to do business again with you in the future!

name: Tara Morris
text: He beat the other estimate I got by almost half. He did a fantastic job and went above and beyond what I expected. I highly recommend him!

resp.text: Thank you Tara for the review! We always go above and beyond to please our customers! We specialize in storm damage and getting trees off of houses. Thank you so much for the business and looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: Carlotta Crawford
text: Very pleased with this company. They came and cut down a large tree close to my house and storage building that seemed impossible but got the job done. Cleaned up everything and the backyard never looked better. I highly recommend this company, they do it right.

resp.text: Thank you so much Carlotta for your review! We specialize in working in tight areas. We study alot on dangerous tree removal and working in tight spaces. We are very thankful for your business and glad that we could do work for you! Professionalism and customer service is our #1 priority!

name: Stacy Kurtti
text: Josh and his crew are wonderful. The men did an awesome job. Did exactly what we wanted and went above and beyond. Very nice guys.

resp.text: Thank you Stacy for the review! We work very hard to make sure our customers are very satisfied with our work!

name: Beth Phillips
text:
It took the tow truck over two hours to after I was told it was dispatched to make a 30 minute trip. Only after giving them ample time and allowing for traffic did I call back to be told the had taken another call, one that was made after they told me the truck was on the way. Come to find out they have a contract with the state. which I understand. But if they are going to take another call and put it before mine I would think they would have the common decency to at least give me a call and let me decide if I wanted to wait three times what I was expecting. Their price was also a good $75.00 above the going rate.
I was uneducated on towing services, but now know better. I would not recommend Hank's unless you have plenty of time and don't really care how much you spend. A disaster from start to finish. Horrible business practices to leave a customer waiting all that time without at least a courtesy call.

name: David Pilgrim
text: My late father's truck got towed after 12 midnight on a Friday my son was driving the truck and went to jail , monday I called and they said 330 to get it out remind you they only towed it 2 miles when I got over there about 1 they said 390.00 they charged another 35 dollars because I wasnt there at 12 the reason and I told them I had to go to my brothers house and get my dads death certificate to get a release on it anyway the Pell city police dept said they had  few complaints on them ,I finally talk them into 360.00 but that low down shame they would take advantage of people charging that much oh it was a 100 admission fee plus 200 just for towing it 2 miles , what is the admission fee for I dont mind paying 200 towing it 2 miles which is high but then they add 100 admission fee what the hell is that for plus 35 aday storage. it should have been 200 to tow 70 storage for 2 days not 390 they wanted. that's doing people wrong and they get by with it because if you dont pay what they want you dont get your car , they got a hell of a racket going on and I'm wfiting the chief of police so they can discuss it over the next council meeting hopefully they wont be towing for Pell city a more,  and that fat boy that was there is lucky I kept my cool because I dont play no games especially when. I'm being ripped off  it was his lucky day I gave him a pass because I dont let fat boys run there mouth at me ,he must be used to talking to others like that. just beware if you call Hanks towing be ready to empty your wallet to them and that administration fee on top of towing I dont understand that ha! ha! That's a good one ,you got me this time but never again

resp.text:
Mr. Pilgrim,
All of our pricing, No matter the jurisdiction involved, Are equal in all amounts and are within regulation(s) of the state of Alabama and all local municipalities.
The administrative or "Admin" fee that is charged reflects the costs we have to pay to search within the Alabama Department of Revenue and if applicable, any other state in which the vehicle is registered, to obtain the names of the registered owner and or lienholders (If applicable) on any vehicle pulled in, Reason being as so we don't get someone coming in with a handwritten bill of sale for example, stating that they are the owner of whatever vehicle they may see in our lot is theirs, It's a safeguard measure we take to keep any customers property secure, And to ensure only the rightful owner of the vehicle is allowed to even touch it.
Your invoice copies will reflect that our storage charges are $30 per day, Which added in to your total price accrued of $360, And paid in full.
My apologies on having to meet on social media as a platform for resolution.
Please don't hesitate to contact us for any future towing needs, We'd be glad to amicably assist you in any way we can.

name: Brian Anthony
text:
I didn't use Hank's in the conventional sense, But my insurance (progressive) sent a driver out to my home to pick up my deer damaged vehicle and take it to Birmingham for Progressive to look at.
Your driver was Joey, And I haven't had a better experience with anyone during this period than he was. The tow truck the police called out to pick my truck were nice and quick, But when they asked where I wanted them to take it to, they seemed a little bit annoyed that I wanted it to go to my home, as I wanted to talk with my insurance agent first. I suppose they prefer taking them to their place or a body shop.
When they unloaded my truck, a good bit of the plastic from the headlight and grill fell out on the tow truck, And the driver just brushed it off into my yard where my truck was sitting. I didn't think much of it, I'd just clean it up in the morning when I went out to take pictures to start working with my insurance.
I talked to my insurance, They told me because it's a newer model truck,  That they would have someone from their salvage provider come pick it up, I believe it was 3 days later when I got a call from a lady from IIA or IAA, saying that she was about to be giving a driver the information to come pickup my truck and verified my address and the damages with me.
Not too terrible long after I spoke with her and said ok to having another tow truck company come out, Joey actually called me when he was roughly 30 minutes away from my home to verify my address and that everything was ready to go. He showed up just as he said and came to the door and got me to explain why he was there, And actually gave me the rundown on the process of what would happen if progressive did or did not total my truck. I handed off my keys to him, He went and got  his truck from the street and backed it in to where he'd be able to load it up. Before he backed up into the location, he did ask me if I had septic in the area (I I didn't)  He said he always asks when he has to enter a yard,  Said he's never had a problem with accidentally finding a tank but really didn't want to have to make phone calls explaining a problem!  LOL!
He got down under my truck and did his work with some chains, Put it in neutral to wind it up his truck and chain it down. Now, this is where I became surprised,  He picked up every piece of plastic and debris that had come from my truck and put them in the bed. I never asked him to!
I asked why he did and he said he wanted it to be just as if he and my injured truck were never there. I'm still amazed that there a people that have that mindset.
We talked for a few more minutes as he finished loading and chained my truck down, I asked where they were out of and he gave me a business card with everything on it. I'm in Chilton county, So it's not feasible for me to call a company that's an hour plus away,  But he told me that you have trucks all over the place at any given time, And to call if I needed help, That you might be right down the street!
As I said early on, I never thought that my best experience in this headache would have been the guy that picked up my truck and towed from my home to Progressive's auction yard. It ended up being totaled,  But I'm loving my new blue f150!
Thank you to Joey and Hank's!

resp.text: That is so amazing to hear, Brian! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with our team at Hank's Towing Service. It's great to know that we continue to provide our customers with everything they need. Have a great day!

name: Eden Snyder
text: For anyone considering calling this place for a tow, save your time and money and stay FAR away!! We have had not one, but TWO horrible experiences with this tow service. The first time, they left my 70 year old Father stranded in 90° weather for hours on end, we have AAA and they assigned Hank's to the tow job. They accepted the job and didn't call/notify/cancel the job to give my Dad the opportunity to get another company assigned to the job, they just left him stranded!!! Then, my husband called them last night and they accepted his request for a tow directly,no AAA,  he called them himself since they were close. They told him they would be there in no more than 45 minutes. 1 hour later, no word. He calls them back, they say they took another job and would get him as soon as they finished. 3 HOURS LATER, my husband is still stranded and calls them for the third time. They end up telling him he may be better off calling another company. God forbid what would have happened or how long my husband would have waited if leaving it up to them to follow up on a service they accepted to begin with. Y'all are clearly in the wrong business, and people can be seriously hurt or have personal things in their life that an be SEVERELY affected by your negligence and lack of consideration. Thank God they weren't on their way to work or something pressing that required a timely arrival. Lesson learned. I will be sure to let AAA know to never assign this business to my tow jobs again, and I would recommend the same to all of you, unless you want yourself and loved one's to be stuck out in the middle of the night with no help or in the blistering Alabama heat. Spread the word, Hank's is not a reliable service and should not be in the business they are!

My vehicle was still sitting on the road even after I was sent a text saying it would be picked up at 4:37-4:52, only it was moved about 600 feet to where we initially stopped. The kids built a pyramid of rocks while playing in the ditch, which was approximately 600 feet to where the car was. Which tells me they loaded it then put it back down. WHY IN THE WORLD WOULD YOU DO THAT? Never again.

resp.text: This was on a very busy day, we told this potential client that we would get to her once we were finished with the calls that had come in earlier. text: If you want to be talked over when trying to speak or talked rude to this is the company to use. I called them to explain something just like my insurance company asked me to do. Jason was very rude telling me I shouldn’t even be dealing with him only my insurance company should call him. First off its our vehicle and I’ll call all I need to about it especially when instructed to do so by my insurance company. I was belittled and talked to rudely. Our company will not use them again. We also requested our truck be dropped off at home 3 miles from the accident. He said oh no let me take it to my lot so the insurance company will come out faster. Which we let him do and it cost us $2800.00 because they didn’t come out faster and it sat there from 6/26-8/21. I’ll say the lady in the office was always nice when I spoke with her but Jason who I believe is the owner has no customer service skills. When someone calls to ask about their vehicle you should be willing to answer any questions they have and be nice about it regardless if they have their insurance company involved or not. Especially when you’re telling me a different story then my insurance adjuster told me minutes before I called you.

text: Our h2's radiator cracked in a campground across the lake.  I was a little frantic about what to do because we were 3 hrs from home and a lot of the tow conpanies were closed on Sunday.  I called and he was very nice and came right out, they took it to a dealer for us.  Great service!!!!!!!!! Very friendly!!!!!!

resp.text: Glad we could help you!

name: Dale Byrd
text: I have been dealing with United for over two years now and have had great customer service from Hunter Ellenburg out of the branch on Laughlin Rd in Mobile AL. He has always gone above and beyond to make sure our needs are taken care of.

name: david lyndall
text: Rent somewhere else!  They bragged about their equipment being better that others and theirs still  messed up. Man lift Would periodically stop working in rotation. Caused a huge delay in the job.  Returned  back, explained the problem  and they did a 1 minute test... How thorough can you be in thaybtime frame.  They said it's working fine. Didnt put a man in the basket, didn't raise it up and check much at all. A joke.  Waste of 380. Going to Sunbelt to get a decent piece of equipment. But hey at least they said thank you.

name: Quality Marine
text: Great Company and Service!!! Thank You!!!!

text: Get people to work with. Always egear to help you with your needs.

name: Jamie Vaal
text: We had an amazing experience with these gentlemen! We were visiting from out of town and had a huge issue with a trailer which literally made impossible for us to continue our trip! They went above and beyond (seriously) to help us out! Thank you gentlemen so very much!

name: Mike B
text: Very very rude people. Rseppionist is very rude when she answers phone. Terrible way to treat customers. This place is a joke . Waisted our time and didn't even do the job Which was a very simple job.

resp.text: We tried to accomadate this lady with her situation, I was even working on her project when she came to shop ,as far as being  rude, she wasn't very pleasant  herself, when you explain you will have to work her project in ,I even asked her to go wait in her truck while I finished her project, but no ,so sir I will be glad to finish ,come see me this morning yourself ,plates are all ready  made

text: Called almost at closing time and they told me to have my husband come on in . They stayed open for him and did an amazing job fixing the problem, charged a very reasonable price ,were very professional and friendly.Couldnt ask for any better.Would definitely use again.Thanks Micheal and the guys at J and S.

name: Ronnie Ridlon
text: Wanted to share my experience with United rentals in Foley Alabama. Absolutely amazing, every single person I deal with is awesome and extremely helpful! But I have to give the biggest thanks & Recognition to Sara Polansky! She is amazing, gets whatever I need no matter the hurtles. Always comes though with perfect service!  Great company and people I highly recommend them for anything you can rent.

resp.text: Thanks for the shout-out, Ronnie. We appreciate the feedback and hope we can help out again soon.

text: When I pull in the yard, I never have to wait more than a minute to get waited on. Got to keep my head on a swivel because someone will be coming soon on a forklift to get the trailer off or to unload my truck.

resp.text: Thanks, John. Looking forward to working together again soon.

name: Kevin Maxwell
text: Sales associate(Angie) from the Pensacola Branch has been a pleasure to work with. She always takes care of me and all rentals set up for delivery and pick up with no issues.

resp.text: Thanks, Kevin. We appreciate the positive feedback and shout-out for our team. We're glad we were able to help you with your equipment needs and look forward to working together again soon.

name: Tim Simpson
text: Great place to rent equipment, very friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks, Tim. We appreciate the feedback and your business. Let us know if there's anything we can do to help in the future.

name: Jake Plash
text:
Nice staff, very knowledgeable. There is this one mechanic named Jon, he went out of his way to help my crew understand the machine we picked up. We asked every question possible and he never once brushed us off or got irritated with us(and it was hot out). You don’t get many people that are so knowledgeable and professional. We will come
back just for that one mechanic alone. Good job United

name: Jeff Devine
text: GREAT SERVICE

resp.text: Thanks, Jeff. We appreciate the positive feedback and shout-out for our team. Let us know if we can help out again soon.

name: Angela Wingard
text: Very professional staff. They are always ready to help. The whole team seems to work well together. I love hearing around town how reliable United’s machines are. Great company to help with all your jobs, big or small!
